body.p: When you create a schema document or open an existing one, the editor panel is divided in two sections: one containing the schema diagram and the second the source code. The diagram view has two tabbed panes offering a Full Model View and a Logical Model View.

fig.title: NVDL Schema Editor - Full Model View
NVDL Schema Editor - Full Model View

body.p: The Full Model View renders all the NVDL elements with intuitive icons. This representation coupled with the synchronization support makes the schema navigation easy.
Double click on any diagram component in order to edit its properties.
